name: The Ninjas of Epoch Mall
description:
Game made for SodorJam in 2 weeks! The theme was 'Zelda Clone'.

Closing hours at the Epoch Mall is the time ninjas battle one another for supremacy! You are a ninja who operates a lemonade stand, which is currently being bought out by a Samurai Business Lord! Your duty is to stop him at all costs even if it means gathering the three sacred treasures of the other ninja clans to do so!

Programming, Sprites and SFX by [noblelemon] -- https://noblelemon.itch.io/

Music by ReignitedInferno -- https://reignitedinferno.itch.io/

Environments, Key and Concept Art by w111nd -- https://w111nd.itch.io/

Controls

Basic Keys
Arrows - Move your character
X - Attack

Item Keys (when you have them.)
C - Coupons
V - Coin Toss
Z - Pizza Magic
A - Cool Threads

Debug Keys (I left them in! Be warned, room skip keys can mess up tracking variables and the game might forget where you are. You can also crash the game currently by skipping too much, I'll fix that later.)

F2 - Restart game (resets all progress)
PgUp - Next room in order
PgDn - Previous room in order
Home - Takes you back to the mall

Consider using the Home key if you get stuck on a boss, fill up on items, then try again!
